title: Provides for the limitation of costs of charter schools to five percent of the local board of education's state approved operating expense
summary: Provides for the limitation of costs of charter schools to five percent of the local board of education's state approved operating expense as calculated pursuant to law; applicable to cities with a population of one hundred thousand or less.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to limiting the costs to be paid by the local board of education budget to five percent per annum of that budget
